# Issue Templates for GitHub Copilot

## Bug Report Template
```
**Bug Description**
A clear description of the bug

**Steps to Reproduce**
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected Behavior**
What you expected to happen

**Actual Behavior**
What actually happened

**Copilot Task**
- [ ] Identify the root cause
- [ ] Implement fix with minimal changes
- [ ] Add tests to prevent regression
- [ ] Update documentation if needed
```

## Feature Request Template
```
**Feature Description**
Clear description of the requested feature

**User Story**
As a [user type], I want [functionality] so that [benefit]

**Acceptance Criteria**
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

**Design Requirements**
- UI/UX considerations
- Performance requirements
- Accessibility needs

**Implementation Guidelines**
- Follow Flutter best practices
- Use existing design system
- Ensure proper testing
- Maintain code quality
```

## Copilot Code Generation Template
```
**Code Generation Request**
Specific description of code to generate

**Context**
- File location: [path]
- Related components: [list]
- Dependencies: [list]

**Requirements**
- [ ] Functionality requirement 1
- [ ] Functionality requirement 2
- [ ] Performance requirement
- [ ] Testing requirement

**Code Style**
- Follow project conventions
- Include proper documentation
- Add error handling
- Use TypeScript/Dart best practices
```
